items.summary: Borderlands 4 has arrived on PC to a chorus of criticism over performance and stuttering. Early reports from players described low frame rates and frequent crashes, even on high-end hardware.

items.summary: Amazon says that a bug in a widget on select Echo Show devices caused them to cache high-resolution images and use up a ton of data.

items.title: Top China silicon figure calls on country to stop using Nvidia GPUs for AI โ says current AI development model could become 'lethal' if not addressed
items.summary: VP of China SIA Wei Shaojun urged China and other Asian nations to abandon reliance on Nvidia GPUs for AI and instead develop dedicated processors for LLM training to ensure long-term technological independence.

items.title: OpenAI signs contract to buy $300 billion worth of Oracle computing power over the next five years โ company needs 4.5 gigawatts of power, enough to power four million homes
items.summary: OpenAI and Oracle have signed one of the largest technology deals in history, worth $300 billion. Over five years starting in 2027, Oracle will provide OpenAI with over 4.5 gigawatts worth of computing power to help power ChatGPT and other AI products and services.
